# Wedding Invitation Website - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js 14+ wedding invitation website with TailwindCSS and Supabase backend.

## Design System
- **Colors**: Ivory (#FFFEF7), Beige (#F5F1E8), Blush (#F9E5E5), Rose (#E8C4C4), Gold (#D4AF37)
- **Typography**: Noto Serif KR, Nanum Myeongjo
- **Breakpoints**: Mobile (~767px), Tablet (768-1023px), Desktop (1024px+)

## Completed Tasks
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Install dependencies and configure TailwindCSS
- [x] Set up Supabase integration
- [x] Implement components (Hero, Profiles, Gallery, Map, Guestbook)
- [x] Configure responsive design
- [x] Test and compile project

## Next Steps
- [ ] Implement Infinity Loop gallery with animations

Running at: http://localhost:3000
